TopicTitle: Need recruits for a starmade faction (Nextech Enterprises Recruiting)

Articles.Content:
> 
> Well, I've joined. It was quite a journey to the base, but I made it. I did some mining, and build a refinery/factory with 2000 factory enhancers in total. Look for the mostly-red segment "clamped" to the shop above the main section of the base (Or the second huge mining ship above the main base). There is a rail elevator to the refinery from the main building. Pressing the lower button brings the elevator down, the upper button sends it up.
> If you've got the materials for your ship, you can use any of the machines there. (Please don't take my stuff, though if you *really* need it it's yours)

Thank you for joining ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) we could use your help ask enders if hes online to promote you ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Just a heads up; I changed the flag at the base, and I'm suggesting that be our faction emblem. Opinions and Recommendations welcome!

> 
> Just a heads up; I changed the flag at the base, and I'm suggesting that be our faction emblem. Opinions and Recommendations welcome!

The glowing stick figure? (that's what it looked like to me when I last checked.)

I like it though we could probably come up with something better.

> 
> The glowing stick figure? (that's what it looked like to me when I last checked.)
> I like it though we could probably come up with something better.

Yeah i guess it wasnt very nice but i wanted something to stamp on the sides of our ships just to let people know that we are not to be messed with! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![ETy9nhg.png](http://i.imgur.com/ETy9nhg.png)

So I think this is the new flag. (It is, right?)

I like it.

EDIT:

What the... where'd my jumpship go?! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

I spawned in another ship and it disappeared, along with pieces of base.

Well, I think it's safe to say it's gone... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I've got blueprints, it's not all bad.

But it's super strange. I used that ship to jump back to base, and then I spawned in the new ship, and then when I turned around the jumpship was gone.

Oh dear...

My own base suddenly feels so inferior.

Woo for more starmade players! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Thryn Monarchy Member, here. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) Come say hi on the Forums, in the chat sometime guys!

> 
> Oh dear...
> My own base suddenly feels so inferior.

If you want you can join our faction and you will get a free escort ship.
There's a guy on the server asking if he can join our faction, can I let him in?

Who are they? What's their intentions? It's best if we ask questions before letting them join, just so we can know what he's gonna do.

-EDIT-

Also, Vaporo, what's your username and faction on the server? We'd be happy to integrate you into our group.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-19T23:13:36Z" title="06/19/2015 11:13  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 19, 2015</time> by [ Jeremy ]**

> 
> Who are they? What's their intentions? It's best if we ask questions before letting them join, just so we can know what he's gonna do.

Well, he's just starting out on the server, but says he plays a lot of singleplayer. He seems like a good guy, I lent him a whole bunch of spare stuff from my stash.

There are BIG PROBLEMS with the base though. I asked an admin about the disappearing blocks and they said to move closer to spawn. I suggest we do this ASAP.

> 
> ![CVpagIs.png](http://i.imgur.com/CVpagIs.png)
> 
> ![mwUehA1.png](http://i.imgur.com/mwUehA1.png)
> 
> ![ArqMgmP.png](http://i.imgur.com/ArqMgmP.png)
> 
> ![svfwgss.png](http://i.imgur.com/svfwgss.png)
> 
>

On the note of disappering blocks, I'm pretty sure that's a clientside issue, The base looks comeplety intact to me, try turning off GL\_Multidraw in the advanced settings on the launcher under Settings.

> 
> On the note of disappering blocks, I'm pretty sure that's a clientside issue, The base looks comeplety intact to me, try turning off GL\_Multidraw in the advanced settings on the launcher under Settings.

Well that's weird. Is my AUS-2 jumpship there?
Last time I was there, All the ships and things were still there, but I can't check atm due to the launcher not starting, I'll try again when I can.

How many of you are online right now?

Because i plan to do a group siege of a pirate base.
